short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds mnemonic images to WaniKani lessons and reference pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KaniAI enhances your WaniKani experience by transforming mnemonics into AI-generated visuals.

With just a click during your WaniKani lessons, you can view a visual representation of the mnemonic story associated with each Kanji. These images serve as an extra layer of memory association, making it easier to remember Kanji meanings and readings. Since WaniKani mnemonics often involve imaginative stories and characters, this extension brings those stories to life, adding a visual dimension to your learning and review sessions.
